0.3: It's been half a year coming, but the Rock Bottom beta is finally back. This is an abbreviated changelog because a lot of stuff changed, basically. I was originally planning to wait until the auth system is done before bringing the beta back, but I've changed my mind. So here it is!

Generally make everything perform a bit better hopefully
